Mantella




*Mantella follows Shredder.*




Mantella: What's going on now?"




*Mantella asks Shredder with a small curious smile.*

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 24, 2000 5:29 PM
Subject: Big Post


>
> Ok, I just read 150 emails, so if I get something wrong here, please
correct
> me.
>
> And Skulletron, its not ok. You can't post people being knocked out, even
for
> a little while. I don't know if you wanna rewrite your post, but I'm going
to
> respond to before Skulletron ran off. And if you're going to run out of
the
> bridge, let me respond before you go somewhere in one post. The defences
> would be firing at you continuoustly.
>
> ::Zardus/Ramulus/Shredder/Striker/Proto/Chordate/Smokescreen::
>
> Outside the room, Zardus turns to Sickle, frowning when he saw it as a
fish.
>
> "I'm Zardus, Alliance commander," he says to the fish, wondering if his
> circuits were breaking down, "You are?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus looks down at SnowCat, grinning as color returns to his face.
>
> "You try flying up there, see how you feel!"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Shredder walks out of the Destron bace and looks at the two new bots,
> sighing. This was getting on his nerves, the constant interruptions.
>
> "Who are you two?" he asks, looking them over.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker paced back and forth in his cell. He had to warn the Maximals, he
> just had to! He growls, trying to think of a way. He hoped that Ramulus
would
> be smart enough to see through the trap, and to be carefull.
>
> Striker frowns at the door, starting to think of something.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Proto looks up at Necromancer. Proto's chest was melted and leaking
mechfluid
> at a quick rate, his left foot looked like it had been slammed with
something
> big, and there was gashes all over his arms from tree branches.
>
> "Hey, would you mind giving me a lift too?" he asks. He hated requesting
> help, but there was no way he'd make it 1000 miles back to base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Chordate throws himself to the left, Skulletron's shot shooting off his
ear
> and leaving a leaking, melted spot in his cranium. He jumps forward,
feeling
> a bit dizzy, and spins around, firing two shots at Skulletron.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen enters the bridge, instantly pulling out his gun as he sees
the
> battle. He runs inside, firing at Skulletron.
>
>
>
